    • alertSMSMAIL

      public void alertSMSMAIL(javafx.event.Event event, String message)
      Displays an alert dialog with the given message.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the alert
      message - the message to be displayed in the alert dialog

    • alertHandler

      public void alertHandler(String allertMessage, boolean isBad)
      This method is used to display an alert message to the user. The method takes in two parameters, the first being the message to be displayed, and the second being a boolean value indicating whether the message is a warning or an error (isBad = true) or a confirmation (isBad = false).
      Parameters:
      allertMessage - String message to be displayed in the alert
      isBad - boolean value indicating whether the message is a warning or an error (isBad = true) or a confirmation (isBad = false)
